TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ECDsaCng extends System.Security.Cryptography.ECDsa
Public NotInheritable Class ECDsaCng Inherits ECDsa
public ref class ECDsaCng sealed : System::Security::Cryptography::ECDsa

summary.span: 提供椭圆曲线数字签名算法 (ECDSA) 的下一代加密技术 (CNG) 实现。

span.span: Provides a Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) implementation of the Elliptic Curve Digital Signature Algorithm (ECDSA).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当使用 Windows CNG 库执行平台互操作时，才应直接使用此类。This class should only be used directly when doing platform interop with the Windows CNG library. 当不需要平台互操作时，应使用 工厂方法，而不是特定的派生实现。When platform interop is not needed, you should use the factory methods instead of a specific derived implementation. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 类对消息进行签名，以及如何使用签名来验证消息是否未被更改。The following example shows how to use the class to sign a message and how to use the signature to verify that the message has not been altered. [!code-csharp[ECDsaCng#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ecdsacng/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ECDsaCng#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ecdsacng/vb/program.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用随机的密钥对初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a random key pair.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数不会立即生成新的公共/专用密钥对。This constructor does not generate a new public/private keypair immediately. 此构造函数将 属性设置为521，并且当需要某个键时，保存的大小用于标识目标曲线。This constructor sets the property to 521 and when a key is needed the saved size is used to identify the target curve. 如果通过 方法或其他密钥导入方法加载密钥，则此构造函数中的密钥大小没有任何意义。If a key is loaded via the method, or other key import method, the key size from this constructor has no meaning.

exception.span: 此系统不支持下一代加密技术 (CNG) 类。

span.span: Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) classes are not supported on this system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数不会立即生成新的公共/专用密钥对。This constructor does not generate a new public/private keypair immediately. 此构造函数将 属性设置为提供的值，并且当需要某个键时，保存的大小用于标识目标曲线。This constructor sets the property to the provided value and when a key is needed the saved size is used to identify the target curve. 如果通过 方法或其他密钥导入方法加载密钥，则此构造函数中的密钥大小没有任何意义。If a key is loaded via the method, or other key import method, the key size from this constructor has no meaning.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性接受以下算法： 、、、和 。This property accepts the following algorithms: , , , , and . 还可以使用其他自定义哈希算法。Other custom hash algorithms may also be used. 由于 MD5 和 SHA1 出现冲突，Microsoft 建议 。Due to collision problems with MD5 and SHA1, Microsoft recommends . 默认算法是 。The default algorithm is . 如果要对已进行哈希处理的数据进行签名或验证，则不会使用此属性。This property is not used if you are signing or verifying data that is already hashed.

span.span: The value is .

summary.span: 获取或设置非对称算法所用密钥模块的大小（以位为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the size, in bits, of the key modulus used by the asymmetric algorithm.

value.span: 非对称算法所用密钥模块的大小（以位为单位）。

span.span: The size, in bits, of the key modulus used by the asymmetric algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将此属性设置为其当前值，则不会产生任何效果。Setting this property to its current value has no visible effect. 如果将此属性设置为新的合法值，则将放弃当前密钥，但会推迟创建新密钥，直到需要一个密钥。Setting this property to a new legal value discards the current key, but defers creation of a new key until one is needed. 由于键大小不唯一标识椭圆曲线，因此不建议使用属性 setter。Because key sizes do not uniquely identify elliptic curves, the use of the property setter is discouraged. 若要生成特定曲线上的新键，请使用 方法。To generate a new key on a specific curve, use the method.

span.span: is not permitted by .

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Security.Cryptography.KeySizes[] LegalKeySizes { get; }
.property instance class System.Security.Cryptography.KeySizes[] LegalKeySizes
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property LegalKeySizes As KeySizes()
public: virtual property cli::array <System::Security::Cryptography::KeySizes ^> ^ LegalKeySizes { cli::array <System::Security::Cryptography::KeySizes ^> ^ get(); };
member this.LegalKeySizes : System.Security.Cryptography.KeySizes[]

summary.span: 获取 属性资源库支持的密钥大小（以位为单位）。

span.span: Gets the key sizes, in bits, that are supported by the property setter.

value.span: 一个数组，该数组包含 属性 setter 支持的密钥大小。

span.span: An array that contains the key sizes supported by the property setter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在椭圆曲线加密（ECC）中，密钥大小不是密钥生成过程中的唯一输入，它派生自特定椭圆曲线的曲线参数。In Elliptic Curve Cryptography (ECC) the key size is not the only input into the key generation process, it is derived from the curve parameters for a specific elliptic curve. 此属性仅报告三个合法密钥大小：256、384和521位。This property reports only three legal key sizes: 256, 384, and 521 bits. 当密钥大小仅用作密钥生成的基础时，支持的大小将映射到命名曲线 secp256r1 （又称 NIST P-256）、secp384r1 （又称 NIST P-384）和 secp521r1 （又称 NIST P-521）。When the key size is used alone as a basis for key generation, the supported sizes map to the named curves secp256r1 (aka NIST P-256), secp384r1 (aka NIST P-384), and secp521r1 (aka NIST P-521). 在 Windows 10 上执行时，此类支持许多其他命名曲线，但不会在此属性中反映出来。When executed on Windows 10, this class supports many additional named curves, but that is not reflected in this property.

summary.span: 生成一个签名。

span.span: Generates a signature.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法通过使用 属性对输入数据进行哈希处理，然后对结果进行签名，从而为指定数据生成签名。This method generates a signature for the specified data by hashing the input data using the property, and then signing the result. 如果 对象不随机生成下一代加密技术（CNG）密钥，则需要 标志。The flag is required if the Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) key is not randomly generated by the object.
